problem: A train travels 120 miles in 2 hours. If it maintains the same speed, how far will it travel in 5 hours?
If x + 2y = 10 and 3x - y = 4, what is the value of x?
A rectangle has a perimeter of 24 cm and an area of 32 cm². What are its dimensions?
Find the sum of the first 20 positive integers.
A compound interest investment of $1000 at 5% annual rate compounds quarterly. What is the value after 2 years?
